wikipedia_page.main: Sir John Alexander "Alec" Atkinson KCB, DFC (9 June 1919 – 8 August 2015) was a Royal Air Force officer of the Second World War who later had a distinguished career in the British civil service.

response: **Sir Alec Atkinson, 96, WWII air force officer and civil servant.
